name: Block Crush:Puzzle Mania
description:
Block Crush is a classic and fun block game. This Block Puzzle has new combo mode.

HOW TO PLAY
1. Drag blocks to fill up the lines vertically or horizontally.
2. Try to remove multiple lines at a time to get a higher score.
3. Game over if no room for extra blocks.
4. No time limits.

FEATURES OF THE BLOCK PUZZLE
* Fun and new Block Combo Mode
* Cool blocks and block animations
* With Beginner's guide and suitable for all age
* More Game Modes and easy to learn
* No time limits
* Completely free

Please Enjoy this Block Puzzle Game! The More Play and The More Exciting!!!
